verses.verse: And the whole earth<WH776> was of one<WH259> language<WH8193>, and of one<WH259> speech<WH1697>. language: Heb. lip. speech: Heb. words
And it came to pass, as they journeyed<WH5265> from the east<WH6924>, that they found<WH4672> a plain<WH1237> in the land<WH776> of Shinar<WH8152>; and they dwelt<WH3427> there. from: or, eastward

And they said<WH559> one<WH376> to another<WH7453>, Go to<WH3051>, let us make<WH3835> brick<WH3843>, and burn<WH8313> them throughly<WH8316>. And they had brick<WH3843> for stone<WH68>, and slime<WH2564> had<WH1961> they for morter<WH2563>. they said: Heb. a man said to his neighbour burn: Heb. burn them to a burning

And they said<WH559>, Go to<WH3051>, let us build<WH1129> us a city<WH5892> and a tower<WH4026>, whose top<WH7218> may reach unto heaven<WH8064>; and let us make<WH6213> us a name<WH8034>, lest we be scattered abroad<WH6327> upon the face<WH6440> of the whole earth<WH776>.
And the LORD<WH3068> came down<WH3381> to see<WH7200> the city<WH5892> and the tower<WH4026>, which the children<WH1121> of men<WH120> builded<WH1129>.

And the LORD<WH3068> said<WH559>, Behold, the people<WH5971> is one<WH259>, and they have all one<WH259> language<WH8193>; and this they begin<WH2490> to do<WH6213>: and now nothing<WH3808> <WH3605> will be restrained<WH1219> from them, which they have imagined<WH2161> to do<WH6213>.
Go to<WH3051>, let us go down<WH3381>, and there confound<WH1101> their language<WH8193>, that<WH834> they may not understand<WH8085> one<WH376> another's<WH7453> speech<WH8193>.
So the LORD<WH3068> scattered them abroad<WH6327> from thence<WH8033> upon the face<WH6440> of all the earth<WH776>: and they left off<WH2308> to build<WH1129> the city<WH5892>.

Therefore is the name of it<WH8034> called<WH7121> Babel<WH894>; because the LORD<WH3068> did there confound<WH1101> the language<WH8193> of all the earth<WH776>: and from thence did<WH6327> the LORD<WH3068> scatter them abroad<WH6327> upon the face<WH6440> of all the earth<WH776>. Babel: that is, Confusion
These are the generations<WH8435> of Shem<WH8035>: Shem<WH8035> was an hundred<WH3967> years<WH8141> old<WH1121>, and begat<WH3205> Arphaxad<WH775> two years<WH8141> after<WH310> the flood<WH3999>:
And Shem<WH8035> lived<WH2421> after<WH310> he begat<WH3205> Arphaxad<WH775> five<WH2568> hundred<WH3967> years<WH8141>, and begat<WH3205> sons<WH1121> and daughters<WH1323>.
And Arphaxad<WH775> lived<WH2425> five<WH2568> and thirty<WH7970> years<WH8141>, and begat<WH3205> Salah<WH7974>:

And Arphaxad<WH775> lived<WH2421> after<WH310> he begat<WH3205> Salah<WH7974> four<WH702> hundred<WH3967> <WH8141> and three<WH7969> years<WH8141>, and begat<WH3205> sons<WH1121> and daughters<WH1323>.
And Salah<WH7974> lived<WH2425> thirty<WH7970> years<WH8141>, and begat<WH3205> Eber<WH5677>:
And Salah<WH7974> lived<WH2421> after<WH310> he begat<WH3205> Eber<WH5677> four<WH702> hundred<WH3967> <WH8141> and three<WH7969> years<WH8141>, and begat<WH3205> sons<WH1121> and daughters<WH1323>.
And Eber<WH5677> lived<WH2421> four<WH702> and thirty<WH7970> years<WH8141>, and begat<WH3205> Peleg<WH6389>: Peleg: Gr. Phalec
And Eber<WH5677> lived<WH2421> after<WH310> he begat<WH3205> Peleg<WH6389> four<WH702> hundred<WH3967> <WH8141> and thirty<WH7970> years<WH8141>, and begat<WH3205> sons<WH1121> and daughters<WH1323>.
And Peleg<WH6389> lived<WH2421> thirty<WH7970> years<WH8141>, and begat<WH3205> Reu<WH7466>:
And Peleg<WH6389> lived<WH2421> after<WH310> he begat<WH3205> Reu<WH7466> two hundred<WH3967> <WH8141> and nine<WH8672> years<WH8141>, and begat<WH3205> sons<WH1121> and daughters<WH1323>.
And Reu<WH7466> lived<WH2421> two<WH8147> and thirty<WH7970> years<WH8141>, and begat<WH3205> Serug<WH8286>: Serug: Gr. Saruch
And Reu<WH7466> lived<WH2421> after<WH310> he begat<WH3205> Serug<WH8286> two hundred<WH3967> <WH8141> and seven<WH7651> years<WH8141>, and begat<WH3205> sons<WH1121> and daughters<WH1323>.
And Serug<WH8286> lived<WH2421> thirty<WH7970> years<WH8141>, and begat<WH3205> Nahor<WH5152>:
And Serug<WH8286> lived<WH2421> after<WH310> he begat<WH3205> Nahor<WH5152> two hundred<WH3967> years<WH8141>, and begat<WH3205> sons<WH1121> and daughters<WH1323>.
And Nahor<WH5152> lived<WH2421> nine<WH8672> and twenty<WH6242> years<WH8141>, and begat<WH3205> Terah<WH8646>: Terah: Gr. Thara

And Nahor<WH5152> lived<WH2421> after<WH310> he begat<WH3205> Terah<WH8646> an hundred<WH3967> <WH8141> and nineteen<WH6240> <WH8672> years<WH8141>, and begat<WH3205> sons<WH1121> and daughters<WH1323>.
And Terah<WH8646> lived<WH2421> seventy<WH7657> years<WH8141>, and begat<WH3205> Abram<WH87>, Nahor<WH5152>, and Haran<WH2039>.
Now these are the generations<WH8435> of Terah<WH8646>: Terah<WH8646> begat<WH3205> Abram<WH87>, Nahor<WH5152>, and Haran<WH2039>; and Haran<WH2039> begat<WH3205> Lot<WH3876>.
And Haran<WH2039> died<WH4191> before<WH6440> his father<WH1> Terah<WH8646> in the land<WH776> of his nativity<WH4138>, in Ur<WH218> of the Chaldees<WH3778>.

And Abram<WH87> and Nahor<WH5152> took<WH3947> them wives<WH802>: the name<WH8034> of Abram's<WH87> wife<WH802> was Sarai<WH8297>; and the name<WH8034> of Nahor's<WH5152> wife<WH802>, Milcah<WH4435>, the daughter<WH1323> of Haran<WH2039>, the father<WH1> of Milcah<WH4435>, and the father<WH1> of Iscah<WH3252>.
But Sarai<WH8297> was barren<WH6135>; she had no child<WH2056>.

And Terah<WH8646> took<WH3947> Abram<WH87> his son<WH1121>, and Lot<WH3876> the son<WH1121> of Haran<WH2039> his son's<WH1121> son<WH1121>, and Sarai<WH8297> his daughter in law<WH3618>, his son<WH1121> Abram's<WH87> wife<WH802>; and they went forth<WH3318> with them from Ur<WH218> of the Chaldees<WH3778>, to go<WH3212> into the land<WH776> of Canaan<WH3667>; and they came<WH935> unto Haran<WH2771>, and dwelt<WH3427> there.
And the days<WH3117> of Terah<WH8646> were two hundred<WH3967> <WH8141> and five<WH2568> years<WH8141>: and Terah<WH8646> died<WH4191> in Haran<WH2771>.
